name: ShakespeareSonnets
0:
”Alexa, Open Shakespeare Sonnets”
”Alexa, Open Shakespeare Sonnets and Read A Sonnet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shakespeare sonnets
des: William Shakespeare has partnered with Alexa to deliver his most breathtaking sonnets. Imagine this as his greatest hits as read by Alexa. It's Shakespeare lottery and everyone wins; Ask Alexa to OPEN SHAKESPEARE SONNETS AND READ A SONNET. You'l be swept away to a jolly old... romance. Get in on the action before he is brought back to life by advanced technology such as holograms or virtual reality. Plus it's free. What do you have to lose? The answer is nothing. You have nothing to lose...except your lack of Shakespeare knowledge.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
